alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 4:23PM EDT until June 24 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ray City, or near Lakeland, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Valdosta, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Naylor, Courthouse, Greenwood, Barretts, New Lois, Hansell, Allenville, Stockton and Teeterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
